mapper.select: select id,module_name as moduleName,scene_code as sceneCode,scene_name as sceneName,title,order_id as ids,to_addresses as toAddress, detail,send_date_time as time,status,error_reason as reason from adapter_email_log where id = #{id}

select id,module_name as moduleName,scene_code as sceneCode,scene_name as sceneName,title,order_id as dis,to_addresses as toAddress, detail,send_date_time as time,status,error_reason as reason from adapter_email_log
